# PDF Parser Fixtures

This fixture set is used by `scripts/pdf-parser-validate.js`.

- `reference.md`: target text (human-reviewed)
- `before-*.md`: baseline snapshots (before parser tuning)
- `after-*.md`: tuned snapshots (after parser tuning)

Case set (5):
- ko-text
- ko-table
- mixed
- scanned
- hwp-pdf
